timeline.message:
[0255]
- Implement changes according to the latest specification

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss you can revert this change.  No changes are needed in MainActivity.java.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss You can remove the unused import GateStatus on line 5.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss You can remove line 27 msg.setStatus(...) since you are already setting the status using the DoorStatus constructor.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText:
@kostyaBoss I would delete line 36 and replace it with
assertEquals(TestValues.MATCH, TestValues.GENERAL_GRID, location);
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss I would rename this file to GateStatusTests.java.
timeline.author: santhanamk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,66 @@
+package com.smartdevicelink.test.rpc.datatypes;

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss You can remove line 26  (msg.setStatus(...)) since you are already setting the status using the DoorStatus constructor.
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText:
@kostyaBoss I would delete line 35 (assertTrue(Validator.validateGrid(...)) and replace it with
assertEquals(TestValues.MATCH, TestValues.GENERAL_GRID, location);
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText:
@kostyaBoss I would delete line 36 (assertTrue(Validator.validateGrid(...)`) and replace it with
assertEquals(TestValues.MATCH, TestValues.GENERAL_GRID, location);
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss Below line 37 I would add this line assertEquals(TestValues.MATCH, TestValues.GENERAL_WINDOW_STATE, windowState);
timeline.author: santhanamk

timeline.bodyText: @kostyaBoss It looks like you used the code generator tool to re-generate the entire file.  Can you just merge in the changes that are specific to this PR (in the HTML these would be the parameters from driverDoorAjar to roofStatuses)?
timeline.author: santhanamk
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,215 +1,423 @@
-/*
- * Copyright (c) 2017 - 2019, SmartDeviceLink Consortium, Inc.

+ return this; + } + + /** + * Gets the gateStatuses. + * + * @return List Provides status for trunk/hood/etc. if Ajar/Closed/Locked + * {"array_min_size": 0, "array_max_size": 100} + * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 + */ + @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") + public List getGateStatuses() { + return (List) getObject(GateStatus.class, KEY_GATE_STATUSES); + } + + /** + * Sets the roofStatuses. + * + * @param roofStatuses Provides status for roof/convertible roof/sunroof/moonroof etc., if Closed/Ajar/Removed + * etc. + * {"array_min_size": 0, "array_max_size": 100} + * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 + */ + public BodyInformation setRoofStatuses(List roofStatuses) { + setValue(KEY_ROOF_STATUSES, roofStatuses); + return this; + } + + /** + * Gets the roofStatuses. + * + * @return List Provides status for roof/convertible roof/sunroof/moonroof etc., if Closed/Ajar/Removed + * etc. + * {"array_min_size": 0, "array_max_size": 100} + * @since SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 + */ + @SuppressWarnings("unchecked") + public List getRoofStatuses() { + return (List) getObject(RoofStatus.class, KEY_ROOF_STATUSES); + } +}

timeline.bodyText: The unit tests on the PR currently fail because of an issue in develop branch. The issue got fixed on develop branch for Java Suite. Please merge develop into your branch and make sure that unit tests pass on the PR.
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -175,41 +247,177 @@ public IgnitionStatus getIgnitionStatus() {
         return (IgnitionStatus) getObject(IgnitionStatus.class, KEY_IGNITION_STATUS);
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Sets the driverDoorAjar.
+     *
+     * @param driverDoorAjar References signal "DrStatDrv_B_Actl". Deprecated starting with RPC Spec 7.1.0.
+     * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0
+     * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0
+     */
+    @Deprecated

timeline.bodyText: please replace this * SmartDeviceLink 2.0 with that: * * @since SmartDeviceLink 2.0.0 * @deprecated in SmartDeviceLink 7.1.0 * For driverDoorAjar, passengerDoorAjar, rearLeftDoorAjar, rearRightDoorAjar to indicate that they are deprecated
timeline.author: bilal-alsharifi
